attributes.action: Grant permanent right to live and work in the UK visa to Roman Abramovich
attributes.additional_details: Confirmatory evidence of his investments is available through Chelsea FC and it’s Chairman Mr Bruce Buck.
attributes.background: Mr Abramovich has invested over £1 Billion into the UK through his ownership of Chelsea FC and other ventures. He has created and secured hundreds of jobs and supported the communities in Fulham and Chelsea as well as in Surrey.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because its about something the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for. 

The decision about whether to apply for a permanent visa, would be a personal decision for Mr Abramovich. 

You can find out more about applying to settle in the UK here:

https://www.gov.uk/settle-in-the-uk
